Method Detail

writeUnsignedByte

protected final void writeUnsignedByte(int length,
                                       int value)
                                throws IOException
Writes an unsigned byte value. This method doesn't check the validity of the value and writes the lower length bits in value.

Parameters:
length - bit length between 0 (exclusive) and 8 (inclusive).
value - value
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

writeUnsignedShort

protected final void writeUnsignedShort(int length,
                                        int value)
                                 throws IOException
Writes an unsigned short value. This method doesn't check the validity of the value and writes the lower length bits in value.

Parameters:
length - bit length between 0 (exclusive) and 16 (inclusive)
value - value to write
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs
